trends: There have been no other sightings in Salome
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Saw large circle of lights about 30 degrees off ground, took pics then it disappeared.
divs: sighting detailsi got this info from a girl that works for me. i did not see this object. driving west on i-10, she exited onto salome road (45 minutes west of avondale). after driving about 10-15 minutes she saw a round row of flashing lights. she was looking for them because she saw them a few days earlier in the same spot only this time they were higher up in the air than when she saw them previously. she called me at the restaurant to tell me that she can see them again. i told her to take some photos with her phone and send them to me. she was scared but she did take 4 before the object disappeared. she said it didn't fly away it simply turned off or disappeared. she is willing to give you details if you want to interview her personally. i can be reached on me cell at {pid} ken i have a 4th picture that would not fit below. {cms\jat\ text moved to narrative
